root:
^"It's okay, how can I help you?"
¿Cómo puedo ayudarte?
^"I'm looking to get into the city."
^"You can take the bus, taxi, or subway."
^"I see signs but I'm not sure which one is which or where to go."
^"Which one are you hoping to use?"

bus: ^"Okay you are going to look for signs that say <color=#0079C0>autobús</color>. Bus number 150 goes to the city center."
^"Line 150 takes you to the center of Valencia with stops in towns of Mislata, Quart de Poblet and Manises."
taxi: ^"Okay you are going to look for signs that say <color=#0079C0>taxi</color>."
^"Any idea how much it might cost?"
^"Depends where you are heading. The airport is in a suburban area, you will be charged 5,40 euros extra."
subway: ^"Subway or also known as the tube?"
^"Okay you are going to look for signs that say <color=#0079C0>Metrovalencia</color> on the ground floor of the regional flight terminal."
^"Line 3 connects the airport with the city center. It also has stops in the university area and northern part of the city."
